title: Sindhuja Microcredit raises $14.5 m equity from Gawa Capital, Oikocredit
description: Noida-based Sindhuja Microcredit has secured $14.5 million from GAWA Capital and Oikocredit to expand operations by 50% in FY25 and enter new markets. The investment aims to empower rural communities and women borrowers. With backing from global impact investors, Sindhuja plans to grow by 50-60% in the upcoming year, targeting expansion into southern India.
